Name: maximize_team_skill_coverage
Description: Maximize the cumulative skill level of the team for the project's required features

Name: minimize_sprint_overcommitment
Description: Minimize the difference between planned sprint effort and team capacity

Name: maximize_velocity_consistency
Description: Maximize the team's average velocity to ensure predictable planning

Name: minimize_blocker_resolution_time
Description: Minimize the average time taken to resolve blockers

Name: maximize_stakeholder_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the positive feedback from sprint reviews

Name: minimize_context_switching
Description: Minimize the number of different features a developer works on in a single sprint

Name: maximize_feature_completion
Description: Maximize the number of high-priority features completed per release

Name: minimize_technical_debt_growth
Description: Minimize the introduction of new tasks marked as 'debt' or 'refactoring'

Name: maximize_team_availability
Description: Maximize the cumulative available working hours of the team for the sprint

Name: minimize_planning_duration
Description: Minimize the time spent in sprint planning meetings
